0010011000111000 0010001001001001 1 -> sum: 0100100010000010, cout: 0
0100001010000111 0011101001000111 0 -> sum: 0111110011001110, cout: 0
0110011001010111 1111111101100010 0 -> sum: 0110010110111001, cout: 1
1010010100001010 0000001000001101 0 -> sum: 1010011100010111, cout: 0
0010110011101101 0101001000010011 1 -> sum: 0111111100000001, cout: 0
